title: Djokovic and Murray team up at the Australian Open
description: Watch as Novak Djokovic and his new coach Andy Murray practise ahead of the Australian Open in Melbourne.
excerpt: Watch as Novak Djokovic and his new coach Andy Murray practise ahead of the Australian Open in Melbourne.
text: Watch Novak Djokovic on the practice court with new coach Andy Murray as he continues preparations for the first Grand Slam of 2025, the Australian Open.READ MORE: Murray to coach Djokovic at Australian Open
html:
Watch Novak Djokovic on the practice court with new coach Andy Murray as he continues preparations for the first Grand Slam of 2025, the Australian Open.

READ MORE: Murray to coach Djokovic at Australian Open
